item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 31, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI O3-Mini (439 points | 453 comments)
2. Bypass DeepSeek censorship by speaking in hex (217 points | 153 comments)
3. Add "fucking" to your Google searches to neutralize AI summaries (234 points | 100 comments)
4. Elite on the 6502: The original 6502 assembly source, heavily commented (88 points | 10 comments)
5. FBI, Dutch police disrupt 'Manipulaters' phishing gang (85 points | 23 comments)
6. Show HN: Uscope, a new Linux debugger written from scratch (161 points | 75 comments)
7. Tesla Paid Zero Federal Income Tax in 2024, Despite $2.3B in Income (23 points | 1 comment)
8. The Tensor Cookbook (59 points | 7 comments)
9. Theoretical limitations of multi-layer Transformer (63 points | 8 comments)
10. FurtherAI (YC W24) Is Hiring engineers and researchers to build Vertical AI agents ( | hide)
11. Designing Great Watchdog Timers for Embedded Systems (3 points | discuss)
12. Zusie – My Relay Computer (90 points | 26 comments)
13. When Greedy Algorithms Can Be Faster [C++] (21 points | 5 comments)
14. Fixing E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial for the Atari 2600 (2013) (86 points | 30 comments)
15. Shell-ish scripting in Go with ease (88 points | 29 comments)

19. Better Know a Ruby Thing: Singleton Classes (66 points | 8 comments)
20. Instagram and Facebook Blocked and Hid Abortion Pill Providers' Posts (165 points | 93 comments)
21. Images reveal exocomets around nearby stars (78 points | 8 comments)
22. GenAI Art Is the Least Imaginative Use of AI Imaginable (95 points | 85 comments)
23. Apple files emergency motion to become defendant in US vs. Google [pdf] (322 points | 338 comments)
24. Real-time, river sections downstream of sewage discharges from storm overflows (43 points | 13 comments)
25. LinuxPDF (6 points | 1 comment)
26. MillenniumDB: Property graph and RDF engine, still in development (58 points | 23 comments)
27. How will Australia's under-16 social media ban work? We asked the law's enforcer (26 points | 23 comments)
28. Oil giant Shell walks away from major New Jersey offshore wind farm (21 points | 2 comments)
29. Hydro: Distributed Programming Framework for Rust (253 points | 45 comments)
30. Germany: Number of unemployed highest in 10 years (11 points | discuss)
